description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 1/13/2006

Brooke continues to chastise Taylor for her hypocrisy, while at the same time Stephanie attempts to persuade Ridge to forgive Taylor.  Stephanie then attempts to influence Taylor to go make things right with Ridge, however Taylor begins to see that Stephanie is more concerned about Ridge ending up with Brooke rather than Taylor fixing her marriage.  When Brooke arrives home she finds Ridge playing with R.J.  Ridge is quick to explain how much he misses his children, and Brooke.  While tucking the children in, Ridge prepares to ask Brooke a very important question.
